description: A 75% fall in income has forced the company to offer a "limited schedule" until the end of the year.
title: Coronavirus: Condor Ferries to cut almost 200 jobs
title_page: Coronavirus: Condor Ferries to cut almost 200 jobs - BBC News
maintext: "We fully recognise our responsibilities for supporting the visitor economy, travel for Channel Islanders and for bringing in essential freight, and whilst none of us can use a crystal ball to predict the future, we hope that normality can, at some point, return," he said.
